messages.subject: "Senhu Nihonto" & "Jisen Totan" book search
messages.msgSnippet: New Year$B!G(Bs day is coming to an end in my part of the world. It$B!G(Bs time for my New Year$B!G(Bs resolution to find these two books for my
messages.messageBody:
New Year’s day is coming to an end in my part of the world.

It’s time for my New Year’s resolution to find these two books for my
collection:



"Senhu Nihonto" by Narise Sekiji, 1942 - [戦ふ日本刀 成瀬関次 昭17]

"Jisen Totan" by Narise Sekiji, 1941 - [實戦刀譚 成瀬関次 昭16]



Please let me know if you have either available for sale.



Thanks,

Jim



_____________________________________________________

BladeShark



* Kanji character tables
* http://bladeshark.com/
* email: tantojim@...
